Package com.pump.showcase

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlphaCompositeDemo
    This is a simple demo exploring the different types of AlphaComposites.
    AngleSliderUIDemo
    A demo class for the AngleSliderUI class.
    AudioComponentsDemo  
    AudioComponentsDemo.AudioPlayerComponentDemo  
    AudioComponentsDemo.SoundListDemo
    A simple demo for the DecoratedListUI, focusing on emulating Mac's playback controls for sound files.
    BmpComparisonDemo
    This application prompts you for a BMP file and then executes a few tests.
    BristleStrokeDemo
    A simple demo program showing off the BristleStroke.
    BrushedMetalDemo  
    BrushStrokeDemo
    A simple demo program showing off the BrushStroke.
    CalligraphyStrokeDemo
    A simple demo program showing off the CalligraphyStroke.
    CharcoalStrokeDemo
    A simple demo program showing off the CharcoalStroke.
    ClipperDemo
    A simple demo program for the Clipper class.
    CollapsibleContainerDemo
    A demo app for the CollapsibleContainer class.
    ColorBandDemo
    This small demo app features two horizontal gradients, and each shows below it a zoomed-in image highlighting where pixels change.
    ColorDemo  
    ColorDemo.ColorPaletteDemo  
    ColorDemo.ColorPickerDemo  
    CustomizedToolbarDemo
    A demo app for the CustomizedToolbar.
    DecoratedPanelUIDemo
    A demo application/applet for the DecoratedPanelUI.
    DecoratedPanelUIDemo.MiddlePanel
    This sits inside the panel as decoration; it is meant to better demonstrate what the DecoratedPanelUI looks like when it is a backdrop to real content.
    EquationsDemo  
    FilledButtonUIDemo
    A simple demo of different FilledButtonUI samples.
    GifWriterDemo  
    GraphicsWriterDemo  
    HalftoneGradientDemo
    A simple app demoing the HalftoneGradient.
    HSBInlineDemo
    This demonstrates the performance difference you see in a tight loop iterating over pixels if you avoid making any external method calls.
    ImageQuantizationDemo
    A simple demo program that applies color and image quantization to an image.
    ImageScalingDemo
    A demo app that shows off the Scaling class.
    JavaTextComponentHighlighterDemo
    This little demo app combines the JavaTextComponentHighlighter with a LineNumberBorder and demos a TextBoxHighlightPainter.
    JPEGMetaDataDemo
    A simple demo for the JPEGMetaData class.
    MathGDemo  
    MultiWindowDemo
    This showcases a few different JComponents in a JDesktopPane.
    OutputDemo  
    PumpernickelShowcaseApp  
    ResourcePoolDemo
    This simple app makes a few comparison related to whether the ResourcePool marks an improvement or not.
    ScreenCaptureDemo
    A demo application for the ScreenCapture class.
    ShapeBoundsDemo
    A simple test showing off the efficiency of ShapeBounds.
    Spiral2DDemo
    A simple app demoing the Spiral2D
    StrokeDemo
    An abstract model to demo a stroke.
    SwingComponentsDemo  
    TextEffectDemo
    An applet demonstrating a few simple text effects.
    TextSearchDemo
    A demo app/applet for the TextSearchBar classes.
    Transition2DDemo
    A demo of the Transition2D architecture.
    Transition3DDemo
    A demo of the Transition3D classes.
    TransitionDemo
    An abstract UI to demo a set of transitions.
